questions: Is there a pillow in the image?
Is there an armchair in the image?
Is there a small side table in the image?
Is the pillow perched on the armchair?
Is the armchair in front of the small side table?
model_output:
yes there is a white pillow in the image
yes there is an armchair with a wooden frame
yes there is a small side table next to the armchair
yes the pillow is placed on top of the armchair
no the armchair is not in front of the small side table; the side table is adjacent to the armchair
